Text.Page:
Wow! We've sent you on a lot of boring crafting missions, but it's because your work is outstanding.

Rare, high quality materials are how we support the precious cause we're all fighting for, and your support to the Hands of Velika is appreciated.

Enough of me blubbering. Go talk to {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}.

I hate to keep asking you, but could you craft some items for {@LinkCreature:63#3001#Barian}? Supplies are low, and we have to keep them coming in to stay in business.

Without our merchant trade, there would be no Hands of Velika. Yeah. We're that important.

If it isn't my favorite crafter. This looks great.

See {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} for your well-deserved compensation.

Craft celesium plate and bring it to me. It's a special order for a customer I can't let down.

We have to keep our customers happy, you know.

Thanks, . Fine work.

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} made a good call when she recruited you.

Craft cryosilex and deliver it to me as soon as you can.

You're a life-saver.

Craft hemeleather and bring it here quickly.

But don't cut corners. I need the highest quality material you can manage.

Thanks, . I wish I had a cookie to give you, to show you my gratitude.

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} might have a cookie. Why don't you go ask her? Tell her I'll pay her back.

Craft toiracloth, and make haste!

These customers and their special orders are going to be the death of me.

Wow, ! Not only do you work hard and produce quality materials, you're fast!

Thanks.
